entry.name: serviceText
entry.label: the name of the bin to call the vpn service (must be the same used in terminal)

entry.name: statusText
entry.label: the command used to get status of the vpn (ex: hotspotshield status)

entry.name: connectText
entry.label: the command used to get status of the vpn (ex: hotspotshield connect)

entry.name: disconnectText
entry.label: the command used to get status of the vpn (ex: hotspotshield disconnect)
